definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Those opinions and propositions were agreed upon and echoed by many participating leaders.
sentences.chinese: 这些观点和主张得到许多与会领导人的赞同和呼应。

sentences.english: You may wonder how many of his peers would agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 你或许会好奇他的同行中有几个人赞同他的观点。

sentences.english: Hanfeizi has reflected Hanfei's political viewpoint in a concentrated way.
sentences.chinese: 《韩非子》集中反映了韩非的政治观点。

sentences.english: The climateof opinion is the very basis of the revolt.
sentences.chinese: 观点的大环境是现在这场反抗的基础。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是这个观点，我们将艺术襄括进了学校课程之中。

sentences.english: From this viewpoint, globalisation is a kind of phenomenological tool for making sense of the world.
sentences.chinese: 从这个观点看，全球化是个认识世界现象的逻辑工具。

sentences.english: This paper introduces and analyses David Bohm s causal interpretation of quantum potential and his viewpoint of nonlocality.
sentences.chinese: 本文评介了玻姆的量子势因果解释及非定域性观点。

sentences.english: Will business leaders succumb to these ideas?
sentences.chinese: 商业领袖们会被这些观点折服吗？

sentences.english: Expressing opinions is one example of culture difference between east and west.
sentences.chinese: 表达观点的不同是中西文化差异的一个典型例子。

sentences.english: Laureen approves her husband's political views and once canvassed for him.
sentences.chinese: 她赞同丈夫的政治观点，并亲自开车上阵为丈夫助选。

sentences.english: Kay’s argument is that many goals are best pursued obliquely.
sentences.chinese: Kay的观点是很多目标最好是被我们间接地去追逐。

sentences.english: Be open to new ideas, new ways of seeing things and new styles.
sentences.chinese: 要开放地接纳新观点，看事物的新角度，新风格。

sentences.english: Second, the paper scrutinizes the Confucianists ideas in the way of the Marxism outlook .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是用马克思主义观点审视儒家德治思想。

sentences.english: Well, all right, I agree with you about that, but I still prefer a big town.
sentences.chinese: 额，行，我同意你的观点，但是我仍然更喜欢大城镇。
笔者赞同王元化的观点。

definition: way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
